A

addListener(ServerListener) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Registers a listener to be used by this server.

G

getListeners() - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Gets all active ServerListener objects associated with this particular server.
getServerSocket() - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Gets the ServerSocket associated with this server.

N

net.termer.serverlib - package net.termer.serverlib
 

O

onConnect(Socket) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.ServerListener
The method that is called when an ip connects to the server
onDisconnect(Socket) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.ServerListener
The method that is called when an ip disconnects from the server
onIntReceive(Socket, int) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.ServerListener
The method that is called when an ip sends an integer to the server
onStringReceive(Socket, String) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.ServerListener
The method that is called when an ip sends a string to the server

R

removeListener(ServerListener) - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Removes a listener from this server.
removeListeners() - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Removes all active listeners from this server

S

Server - Class in net.termer.serverlib
The basis of the whole library, this class should be instantiated using the address of the machine it's being run on and the port, or just a port to run it locally.
Server(String, int) - Constructor for class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Creates a new server running on the provided address and port.
Server(int) - Constructor for class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Creates a new server running locally on the provided port.
ServerListener - Class in net.termer.serverlib
The basic server listener object to be extended.
ServerListener() - Constructor for class net.termer.serverlib.ServerListener
 
start() - Method in class net.termer.serverlib.Server
Starts the server.
